sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-container fluid class="fill-height">
    <v-row align="center" justify="center">
    <v-col cols="12" sm="8" md="4">
        <v-card class="elevation-12">
        <v-card-title class="headline justify-center">
            User Profile
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-text class="text-center">
            <v-avatar size="200">
            <v-img :src="user.image"></v-img>
            </v-avatar>
            <v-text-field
            label="First Name"
            v-model="user.firstName"
            outlined
            readonly
            class="mt-4"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
            label="Last Name"
            v-model="user.lastName"
            outlined
            readonly
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
            label="Email"
            v-model="user.email"
            outlined
            readonly
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
            label="Phone Number"
            v-model="user.phoneNumber"
            outlined
            readonly
            ></v-text-field>
        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions class="justify-center">
            <v-btn color="primary" @click="editProfile">
            Edit Profile
            </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-col>
    </v-row>
</v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
data() {
    return {
    user: {
        image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/200',
        firstName: 'John',
        lastName: 'Doe',
        email: 'john.doe@example.com',
        phoneNumber: '1234567890',
    },
    };
},
methods: {
    editProfile() {
    this.$router.push('/edit-profile');
    },
},
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-avatar img {
max-width: 100%;
max-height: 100%;
}
</style>
